questions.title: Which payment options do you support?
questions.content: We support PayPal, Wire transfers, Cryptocurrency. If your desired payment option is not listed contact us and we will discuss it further.

questions.title: How much do your services cost?
questions.content: We base the cost of our services on the amount of content that we would be posting on your social media and the content length.

questions.title: Can I use more than one payment method per transaction?
questions.content: No. We only support one payment method per transaction.

questions.title: Do you support refunds?
questions.content: Currently we do not support refunds however if you are for any reason unsatisfied with our work we offer revisions and additional content for free.

questions.title: What do you mean by returns?
questions.content: A return is when a customer is unsatisfied with our product and they decide to remove it from their socials.

questions.title: I've accidentally sent a wrong video, can I change it?
questions.content: Yes. Contact us about the video and we will make sure we take care of it.

questions.title: What is a guarantee?
questions.content: Guarantee is a lawful term and it is normally a promise or a commitment that validates the durability or quality of an item or service. It might be seen as a vow where an item or service will perform in a predefined way.

questions.title: What is an assurance?
questions.content: Assurance is the act of assuring something. It is done to inspire full confidence of the customer.

questions.title: Does Polyminds guarantee quality work and services?
questions.content: Yes. We will always make sure the content you get is of the highest quality.

questions.title: How do I open an account?
questions.content: Click on the register account button and enter your details.

questions.title: How do I close my account?
questions.content: Go to your account settings. Scroll down and you will find a delete account button.

questions.title: Will I see my previous orders on my account
questions.content: Yes. All of your previous services done by us will be displayed on your account page.

questions.title: How frequently will you be posting?
questions.content: We discuss the frequency of the posts with each of our clients and we post accordingly to their needs.

questions.title: What is the most videos you can post in a day?
questions.content: As much as you would need. Most clients don't look for over 3 videos / day.

questions.title: How frequently can I work with you?
questions.content: We are constantly open to work. Any time you would need our services, contact us and we will discuss everything in detail.
